div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1719 Kom Truga, near Alexandria, 1932 (572) Burial: c. 58 B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 59 AR Ptolemy IX Soter II ?: tetradr. Ptolemy XII Auletes: tetradr. Disposition: Alexandria Adriani, AMGR 1932-3 (Alexandreia, 1934), pp. 44-6, fig. 14 (refers to coins as being of Ptolemy Soter II as Svoronos pl. 57; illustration however includes two specimens of the type, e.g., Svoronos 1836 = Ptole- my XII Auletes by Regling's arrangement) Milne, JEA 1935, p. 211
